评论概述: Great scrub top/ stick to regular sizing
评论详情: This is my favorite scrub top as I like the placement of the pockets and the fit (slightly longer in back than front).  After reading reviews I opted to go a size up, but it wasn't necessary.  I tend to size between Small and Medium and the Small fits perfectly.
Comfortable.

评论概述: Good Item but the packing to ship item in will damage it
评论详情: My Scrub top was shipped in a clear plastic bag it comes in from the vendor with vent holes in it. Not secure at all.  What if I didn't want others seeing my order? What if it was damage by liquids or stained on the process of me Receiving it. They need a better shipping policy and material/supplies. Not Professional! The top itself was fine.

评论概述: Big chest big belly big happy

评论概述: These are amazing and I've bought more of them.
评论详情: The fabric is great, it breaths well and dries quickly if liquids get on it. Same with the corresponding pants.  You can hang it from a hanger in the bathroom while you shower and it helps to remove any wrinkles.  The original creases from packaging do take a few washes to lessen and remove, but they're not really noticeable after the first wash.  The smalls are a tad big on me, the x-small in the tops are better but there doesn't seem to be much of a size difference  Overall I love these and I currently have 4 sets of this line.

I love Cherokee scrubs. They are one of my favorites. Despite ordering the same size this one was too big. After washing it shrunk a bit but still not as similar as multiple other styles in this brands. This fabric isn’t as nice either. More thick and not breathable.

It looks nice but when you lift your arms the sleeves are weird and restrict movement.. That’s the only way I can think to describe it. Wish it didn’t because I like the look of the shirt just need to move my arms a lot for work and the sleeves get in the way
Cool material

Love the flexibility on the side seems.

Fits great  very comfortable and lightweight  The stretch is also nice  Will buy again!!

I’ve ordered so many scrub tops from Cherokee and other brands trying to find the right fit & feel and this is it! It’s soft, breathable, not too short, not too long, and actually flattering on a woman’s figure. Really happy with this one.

I really love the torso fit of this top, and the fabric is the perfect weight for summer. But I feel like it is sized very small, and the sleeves kept riding up on me. I'd order it again in a if not for the sleeves.
I absolutely LOVE this top. It’s durable and very comfortable. I will buy more.

Fit nice not too tight.

I love Cherokee uniforms. They are my long standing go to for best fitting and long lasting uniforms.  I love the unique detailing on this top.  It’s fun and flattering.  Surprisingly it is the first Cherokee top I’ve purchased that runs a tad large.  I normally wear an XL.  I don’t wear form fitting clothes.  I was a little dubious about returning for a L.  I liked it so much I took a chance and made the exchange.  The L fits perfect.  Even though the top has a slight hour glass shape it doesn’t show off my tummy bulge.  It has a slight curved shape that gives a slimming effect!
I love this fabric its looks so stylish and feels so soft. At first I thought having no stretch would bother me but these scrubs are super comfy. Have ordered a few more since this purchase.

评论概述: Sent different style than the pic
评论详情: I received a different style than what was pictured. I was buying a duplicate scrub top for work after having tried on several Cherokee styles. The one then sent had more of a flare at the waist and didn’t have utility loops like I wanted. I returned it. Otherwise this line of Cherokee is really good. I get compliments on them all the time but they’re also super functional. I just didn’t like this style or the fact that you don’t get exactly what’s pictured.
